Question: LG Electronics U.S.A., Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LG Electronics U.S.A., Inc.

LG SIGNATURE OLED T

 - The world’s first 4K wireless transparent TV

LG gram Series

 - New LG gram Pro model
 - High-end specifications with ultra-lightweight design

LG UltraGear OLED Monitors

 - Honored with CES 2024 Innovation Awards

General Highlights

 - Over 200 awards and recognitions at CES 2024
 - 33 CES Innovation Awards, with 15 awarded to LG TVs
 - Focus on Smart Life Solutions and AI technology
 - Celebrating webOS with immersive experiences
Summary_cn:
LG电子美国公司

LG SIGNATURE OLED T

- 世界上第一款4K无线透明电视

LG gram系列

- 新款LG gram Pro型号
- 高端规格与超轻设计

LG UltraGear OLED显示器

- 荣获CES 2024创新奖

总体亮点

- 在CES 2024上获得超过200个奖项和认可
- 33个CES创新奖，其中15个授予LG电视
- 着重智能生活解决方案和AI技术
- 通过沉浸式体验庆祝webOS
